Activate

Click on the enable toggle to activate Mailchimp Integration.

API Key(s)

In order to get started and receive subscribers in your MailChimp Lists. You must provide an API KEY of your MailChimp Account.

If you don't know how to get your MailChimp API KEY you can view this Article

How to use?

After completing all the steps, You can now navigate to the page where you want to use Gutenberg Forms.

  1. You can now add MailChimp Option under Form action Panel
  2. After adding Option you can now see another panel created named as MailChimp
  3. Under this panel you can now select the list and map the fields
